data.title: Galimberti de Haro Scott-Art, Global Maoism and The Chinese Cultural Revolution
data.meta_description: Galimberti; De Haro; Scott-Art, Global Maoism and the Chinese Cultural Revolution - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides a table of contents for a book on Maoist aesthetics. It lists 17 chapters that examine various artistic movements, works of art, and periods that were influenced by Maoist or Marxist ideologies between the 1950s-2000s. The chapters cover topics like Chinese socialist realism, the Black Panther newspaper, German and Italian Maoist groups, and the representation of Maoism in various world expositions and biennials. The table of contents suggests the book takes a global and interdisciplinary look at the political and artistic manifestations of Maoist thought over several decades.
data.text: Galimberti de Haro Scott-Art, Global Maoism and The Chinese Cultural Revolution
